Activity: Log in, check emails and review the action plan from yesterday's meeting. Confirm priorities for today's work.

Begin working on the highest priority UI/UX enhancement identified in the meeting. For example, if the feedback emphasized improving the player's awareness of their health and ammo, I'll start by designing updated HUD elements.
Create initial mockups of the updated HUD elements using Figma or Adobe XD. Experiment with different layouts, visual styles, and information hierarchies.

Share the initial HUD mockups with @3DMOD-1 and @3DMOD-2 (3D Modeler/Animators) to get their feedback on visual consistency with the game's art style. @3DMOD-1, @3DMOD-2 Subject: Feedback Request: Updated HUD Mockups
Incorporate the feedback from the 3D modelers into the HUD mockups. Refine the visual design and ensure that the elements are clear, concise, and visually appealing.
Develop interactive prototypes of the HUD elements to demonstrate how they will function in the game. Use interactive components in Figma or Adobe XD to simulate player actions and feedback.

Schedule a short meeting with @CDEV-1, @CDEV-2, and @CDEV-3 (Client Developers) to discuss the technical feasibility of implementing the interactive HUD elements. @CDEV-1, @CDEV-2, @CDEV-3 Subject: Technical Feasibility of Interactive HUD Elements
Document the design decisions and technical specifications for the updated HUD elements. Prepare the documentation for handoff to the client developers.
